short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces instances of ISIS with the evil Losers. Inspired by Scott Adams ISIS to Evil Losers post

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This packages replaces all instances of the word "ISIS" or "Islamic State" with "the evil Losers" on all webpages.

See the blog post that inspired this package at http://blog.dilbert.com/post/160986020961/goodbye-isis-hello-losers
